entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING , Winterland
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 00:08 AM NST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 5.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Winterland Branch Hill 02:30 AM NST Tuesday 24 January 2023
Temperature: 5.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.0 kPa falling
Humidity: 98 %
Dewpoint: 4.8°C
Wind: 29 km/h gust 47 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: Rain at times heavy. Temperature rising to 8 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Rain at times heavy beginning early this evening except snow north of Terrenceville early this evening. Fog patches developing this evening. Amount 20 to 30 mm. Wind becoming southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 this evening then increasing to 60 gusting to 80. Temperature rising to 8 by morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Rain. Temperature falling to plus 2 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Rain ending near noon then cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers or drizzle. Fog patches dissipating in the afternoon. Amount 5 mm. Wind south 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming west 50 gusting to 80 late in the afternoon. Temperature falling to plus 2 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries early in the evening. Wind west 50 km/h gusting to 80 diminishing to 30 gusting to 50 overnight. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries. High zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 7.
